name: Quarks
description:
You are an atom gone rogue, a reactive species bound to disrupt the world of quantum physics with your thirst for quarks. You are a Radical. Go forth and multiply.

1. Capture white electrons from surrounding atoms.
2. Grow your radical.
3. Destroy atoms to release quarks.
4. Capture quarks to advance to next level.

And enjoy listening to the conversation and humor of 2 physicists as they watch in amazement the strange phenomenon that is happening before their very eyes.

Quarks Gone Rogue is a simple game for simple fun. You don't need to be a rocket scientist to win.

Follow us on Twitter for more news, releases and updates: https://twitter.com/bluelunagames
